subject: Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2014)
Olympic Games (2018)
lead_paragraph: Five of 13 venues are already built for the Pyeongchang Games, which will emphasize the mountain venues, unlike the Sochi Games, which were built from scratch and centered in the city.
snippet: Five of 13 venues are already built for the Pyeongchang Games, which will emphasize the mountain venues, unlike the Sochi Games, which were built from scratch and centered in the city.
